articles.description: The telescope, located 5,250 meters above sea level, will detect and gather precise data on primordial gravitational waves in the Northern Hemisphere.
articles.content: China is setting up the worlds highest altitude gravitational wave telescopes in a Tibet prefecture, close to Line of Actual Control with India, with a budget of $ 18.8 million to detect faintest ech… [+2223 chars]
